alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 20 at 7:57PM PDT until May 20 at 9:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL INYO COUNTY... At 757 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms were dissipating over the area between Furnace Creek and Badwater Basin in Death Valley National Park. However, heavy rain that fell between 6 pm and 7 pm will produce ongoing flash flooding until at least 930 pm. CHP reported that multiple vehicles were stuck near Artist Palette due to flooding. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Badwater Road and secondary roads between Furnace Creek and Badwater Basin. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
